question: Match the contents of List-I with List-II

**List-I**
(a) Bioreactors
(b) Downstream processing
(c) Recombinant protein
(d) PCR

**List-II**
i. Insulin produced by rDNA technology
ii. Vessels which convert raw material into specific product
iii. Detect mutated genes in suspected cancer patient
iv. Involves separation and purification
explanation: Bioreactors (ii) are vessels for conversion. Downstream processing (iv) involves separation/purification. Recombinant protein (i) is Insulin (example). PCR (iii) detects mutated genes. Correct: a-ii, b-iv, c-i, d-iii.
